content: Sihang Liu's Homepage Sihang Liu I am an Assistant Professor in the School of Computer Science at the University of Waterloo. Prior to that, I was a visiting faculty at SystemsResearch@Google. I received my PhD degree from the University of Virginia, where I was advised by Dr. Samira Khan. My PhD research was generously supported by a Google Fellowship Award. My research interest lies broadly in computer architecture and systems.
